name: Oddeasy
description:
*Use Q,W,E,R to quickly switch between tabs

OddEasy is an event-based probability simulator, visualizer, and puzzle game designed to improve one's basic understanding of probability.

Made using Unity Personal 5.4.2f2
Music by Eric Matyas, www.soundimage.org

Enjoyed the game? Consider leaving a feedback here!: https://goo.gl/forms/ZJs1WBdo0Q8dXSR92
